name: Elemental Asskicking
description:
Beat It is a homage to old beat em ups, like Streets of Rage, River City Ransom, etc. You take control of a character who is on a mission to eliminate all of your foes, and will stop at nothing to achieve that goal. 

You have 4 different types of enemies and 4 different types of attacks. Each enemy can only be killed with 1 particular type of attack, so you have to make sure you hit them with the right attack type. Kill everyone and make it to the end of the level without dying 

CONTROLS

WSAD - Move

Space - Jump

U,I,O,P - attack
